item.name: Authentication

request.description: Get a JWT via given credentials.

item.name: Register

Logout

Refresh token

Me

item.description: Public APIs for getting clinic info.

item.name:
Get clinics
Get clinic list

Get clinic
Get clinic by id
Doctor

Upload certificate
Form request for upload a certificate image

Get clinic
Get clinic info of the user

Create clinic
Create clinic for this doctor if this doctor doesn't belong to any clinic

Upload clinic image
Upload clinic image with Form data, return the uploaded url.

Get patients
Get all patients created by this user.

Get patient
Get patient by id.

Create patient
Create a patient

Update patient
Update patient detail

Upload patient photo
Form request for upload patient photo, this will also update photo_url filed

Get patient cases
Get all patient cases created by this user.

query.description: The state of case (-1已取消 0创建 1资料已提交(医生) 2资料需修改 3方案已制定(专家) 4方案待修改 5方案已同意 6已确认 7已下单 8订单已确认 10已存档) .

item.name:
Get patient case
Get patient case by id

Create patient case
Create a patient case base on a patient

Update patient case
Update the patient case detail

Delete patient case
Delete patient case by id

Upload case files
Form request for upload a any files relate to a patient case (Such as images)

Get orders
Get all order related to this user

query.description: The state of order (-1=取消交易,0=未付款,1=已付款,2=已发货,3=已签收,4=退货申请,5=退货中,6=已退货) .

item.name:

Update order detail
Update order detail by order and order detail id.

variable.description: The id of the order detail.
